name: GO GA
description:
controls

move with arrows or left stick 

whistle with A or gamepad A

goal

prolong the inevitable outfall of your companions by luring them into safety

get their attention and make them avoid the ever looming end.

make sure to provide physical comfort if they seem stressed out and on the edge.

don't leave anyone behind.

team
  • Petra Hahn
  • Akos Plesznivy
